name: Chess (itch) (Proprogramer)
description:
This is a game made by me (Proprogramer) for the second GameJam by Brackeys in 2020. The theme was "rewind" and i cam up with this.

Enjoy!!!

(The banner image is NOT the game, you have to download the file below.
For some weird reason i couldnt get it to work properly)
